name: Wittle Waffle
description:
Story

You are one of 6 waffle colones who are being used as the energy source in the WFF13 power plant. you must escape!

Info

This game was made for the Games Factory jam

The themes follow...

  • WAFFLE
  • POWER PLANT
  • CLONES
Controls

Use the arrow keys to move. and use x and c to jump and shoot!

Credits

Game made by...

King "King.exe" Worrell

Zahran "Blaze" Worrell
